This is the bugfix release 0.1.10 of bioinf-helperlibs.

The main change is a fix for file type detection when the
file name is just the extension contributed by @SJShaw.

Detailed changes:

Kai Blin (4):
      setup: Fix yet another typo
      chore: Don't try to do slack notifies for PRs
      chore: No longer need to convert markdown docs to rst
      Bump version number to 0.1.10

Simon Shaw (2):
      bio.seqio: refactor extension testing
      seqio: handle cases where the whole filename is the extension
